TopicTitle: Is one unit of LF the same as one unit of OX?

Articles.Content:
Title says it, does one unit of LiquidFuel take up the same mass as a unit of oxidizer?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-13T10:10:55Z" title="05/13/2015 10:10  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 13, 2015</time> by FishInferno**
yes, one unit of either weighs 0.005t
